entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mackenzie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:00 AM PST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mackenzie Airport 11:50 AM PST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: NNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
